xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 7 Kusalattika, Piṭṭhiduka » 7.16 Kusalattika, Saraṇaduka » 7.16.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Kusalattika, Piṭṭhiduka
Kusalattika, Saraṇaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
60.
1693Akusalaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1694Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1695(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
61.
1696Kusalaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
1697Abyākataṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1698Kusalaṃ araṇañca abyākataṃ araṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1699Kusalaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo araṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
1700Abyākataṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
62.
1701Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1702(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
63.
1703Kusalo araṇo dhammo kusalassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1704Abyākato araṇo dhammo abyākatassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
64.
1705Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre…pe…  magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi…pe…  avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1706(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
1707Kusalattikapiṭṭhidukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 7.16.1--7 Paṭiccādivāraup8 Tika, Saraṇaduka >>
